title: [Large-Scale] Simulation/VR-Based Science Project Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theory and research methodology comprehension, digital tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: Cultivating professionals' ability to design science research projects and solve real-world problems in VR/simulation environments

learning_goals: Within two weeks, learners can define a research problem in the science field and create a project design plan using VR simulation tools.
Through small-group teamwork, learners can creatively solve problems encountered during project execution.
Learners can effectively communicate scientific research outcomes through final project deliverables (reports/simulation demos).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
